HTMLElementInputRange.summary: Because this kind of widget is imprecise, it should only be used if the control's exact value isn't important.

HTMLElementInputRange.value: The value attribute contains a string which contains a string representation of the selected number. The value is never an empty string (""). The default value is halfway between the specified minimum and maximumâ€”unless the maximum is actually less than the minimum, in which case the default is set to the value of the min attribute. The algorithm for determining the default value is:If an attempt is made to set the value lower than the minimum, it is set to the minimum. Similarly, an attempt to set the value higher than the maximum results in it being set to the maximum.
